include(HPX_Message)

set(_hpx_full_modules
    algorithms
    async
    async_base
    async_combinators
    batch_environments
    checkpoint
    collectives
    command_line_handling
    compute
    compute_cuda
    distributed_executors
    execution
    executors
    futures
    include
    lcos_distributed
    local_async
    local_lcos
    mpi
    mpi_base
    pack_traversal
    performance_counters
    program_options
    resiliency
    resource_partitioner
    runtime_configuration
    segmented_algorithms
    thread_executors
    threading
    threadmanager
    timed_execution
)

hpx_info("")
hpx_info("Configuring libhpx modules:")

foreach(module ${_hpx_full_modules})
  add_subdirectory(${module})
endforeach()
